name: UserNotificationAttachment
summary: Provide at least the property identifier and url property to identify a local image, sound or video. If your media is invalid, the API will throw an error log and skip the invalid attachment.

properties.name: options
properties.summary: An additional dictionary of options to provide.
properties.description:
Allowed options are:

  • typeHint - File type hint (String)
  • clipping - Clipping enabled or not (Boolean)
  • thumbnailHidden - Thumbnail hidden or not (Boolean)
  • thumbnailTime - Video frame in milliseconds (Number)

properties.name: url
properties.summary: The URL to the attachment's data. If you have obtained this attachment from the notification-center then the URL will be security-scoped.
